name: Healthyfied Fresh Mushroomsoup
description: Indulge in a bowl of Healthyfied Fresh Mushroom Soup, perfect for those seeking a nutritious meal without compromising on taste. This delightful soup is not only low in sodium and high in fiber but also aligns with a health-conscious lifestyle. Packed with fresh mushrooms, broccoli, red onions, green capsicum, and cauliflower, and subtly enhanced with coconut cream and spices, it's a guilt-free indulgence for health aficionados.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the button mushrooms, broccoli, cauliflower, red onion, and green capsicum under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the button mushrooms, broccoli, cauliflower, red onion, and green capsicum into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring 3 cups of water to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped vegetables and garlic (Spice World) to the boiling water, and simmer for 15 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the coconut cream powder, salt, and ground pepper, and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
